queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:lh_left_messages` ( `message_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `reply_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `from_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `from_mail` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `subject` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `message` text NOT NULL, `operator_id` smallint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `operator_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `reply` text NOT NULL, `replied` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_messages` ( `message_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `direction` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `from_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `to_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `text` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`), KEY `from_id` (`from_id`), KEY `to_id` (`to_id`), KEY `direction` (`direction`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_messages_map` ( `self_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `to_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `new_messages` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `last_message` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `direction` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', KEY `to_id` (`to_id`), KEY `self_id` (`self_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_operators` ( `operator_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `login` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `obsolete_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', `register_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `type_notify` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', `last_message` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`operator_id`), KEY `obsolete_time` (`obsolete_time`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_sessions` ( `session_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `ip` double NOT NULL default '0', `time_diff` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `start_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `obsolete_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `last_message` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `readdress` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '0', `chat_counter` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`session_id`), KEY `obsolete_time` (`obsolete_time`), KEY `ip` (`ip`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_stickers` ( `sticker_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `operator_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `operator_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `text` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sticker_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_track` ( `user_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `user_type` char(1) NOT NULL, `avail` char(1) NOT NULL default 'S', `track` text NOT NULL, `chat_track` text NOT NULL ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_type_notify` ( `direction` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `self_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `to_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `flag` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', KEY `self_id` (`self_id`), KEY `to_id` (`to_id`), KEY `type` (`direction`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_visitors` ( `visitor_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `session_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `ip` double NOT NULL default '0', `start_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `obsolete_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `obsolete_time_chat` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `status` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `operator_id` mediumint(8) NOT NULL default '0', `assigned_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `chat_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `chat_counter` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `last_message` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `type_notify` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', `stat_track` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', PRIMARY KEY (`visitor_id`), KEY `ip` (`ip`), KEY `obsolete_time` (`obsolete_time`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_visitors_log` ( `log_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `visitor_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `event` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `operator_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `operator_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `page_url` text NOT NULL default '', `page_title` text NOT NULL default'', PRIMARY KEY (`log_id`), KEY `visitor_id` (`visitor_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_visitors_notes` ( `note_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `visitor_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `operator_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `note` text NOT NULL, `operator_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`note_id`), KEY `visitor_id` (`visitor_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:lh_files` ( `file_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `visitor_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `original_filename` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `size` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `path` text NOT NULL default '', `filename` text NOT NULL default '', `operator_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `operator_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `state` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, PRIMARY KEY (`file_id`)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
